addresses.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'e911_address' || doc.deleted_by_user || doc.pvt_deleted) return; if (doc._attachments) {var att = true} else {var att = false}; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'postal_code': doc.postal_code, 'locality': doc.locality, 'region': doc.region, 'address': doc.street_address + ' ' + doc.extended_address, 'address_confirmed': doc.pvt_address_confirmed, 'attachment': att}); }

addresses_all.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'e911_address' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; if (doc._attachments) {var att = true} else {var att = false}; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'postal_code': doc.postal_code, 'locality': doc.locality, 'region': doc.region, 'address': doc.street_address + ' ' + doc.extended_address, 'address_confirmed': doc.pvt_address_confirmed, 'attachment': att}); }
